General.Name: HC Semitek Corp
General.Description: HC SemiTek Corporation researches, develops, produces, and sells light emitting diode epitaxial wafers and chips in China. It also offers sapphire, sapphire substrate, and sapphire window material, as well as integrated circuit and sensor. The company was formerly known as Wuhan HC SemiTek Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Wuhan, China.

0.Name: Mr. Zhengran  Hu
